project: Donut CLI MCP + Multi-Chain Trading Expansion
description: Transform donut-cli into an MCP server with multi-chain DEX, perps, and prediction market support. Enable natural language trade execution in <30 seconds via Claude Code integration.

userStories.title: MCP Server Foundation
userStories.description: As a Claude Code user, I want to add donut-cli as an MCP server so that I can trade from my existing Claude terminal.
acceptanceCriteria: src/mcp/server.ts implements MCP server protocol using @modelcontextprotocol/sdk
Server exposes donut_swap, donut_balance, donut_quote tools
MCP config example in README.md for Claude Code setup
Server starts with 'donut mcp serve' command
MCP server runs independently, does not interfere with existing agent orchestration
Existing donut chat, donut strategy, donut backtest commands work unchanged
New trading agents registered separately from Strategy Builder / Backtest Analyst
userStories.notes: Extended existing src/mcp-external/server.ts with trading tools: donut_balance, donut_quote, donut_swap, donut_search_token. Tools registered with proper input schemas and handlers. README.md updated with MCP config including Solana wallet setup.

userStories.title: Solana Wallet Integration
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to connect my Solana wallet so that I can execute swaps on-chain.
acceptanceCriteria: Support wallet via private key in .env (SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY)
donut wallet status shows connected wallet and SOL balance
Private keys NEVER logged, even at debug level
Keys loaded only at execution time, not cached in memory
.env file has restrictive permissions warning in setup
userStories.notes: Created src/mcp-external/tools/wallet.ts with handleWalletStatus(), getWalletForSigning(), getWalletPublicKey(). Keys loaded via loadWallet() at execution time only - never cached. Supports base58 and array formats. .env.example updated with SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY config and security warning.

userStories.title: Jupiter Swap Execution
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to swap tokens on Solana so that I can trade via natural language.
acceptanceCriteria: donut_swap tool accepts: { fromToken, toToken, amount, slippage? }
Handles common errors (insufficient balance, slippage exceeded)
Quote preview before execution with donut_quote
Transaction polling until confirmed OR timeout (60s) with clear status
If timeout: return tx signature + 'pending' status, not error
Slippage defaults to 0.5%, user can override
Quote shows expected vs minimum received amount
Confirmation message shows actual vs quoted price
userStories.notes: Created src/mcp-external/tools/swap.ts with handleQuote() and handleSwap(). Uses Jupiter API v6 (api.jup.ag). Quote returns expectedOutput, minimumOutput, priceImpact, route. Swap includes pre-flight simulation, 60s timeout polling, and returns status: signed/submitted/confirmed/failed/pending.

userStories.title: Token Discovery
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to find tokens by name/symbol so that I can swap without knowing contract addresses.
acceptanceCriteria: donut_search_token tool searches Jupiter token list
Returns top 5 matches with symbol, name, address, logo
Token search shows contract address prominently
User must confirm token address before swap
Warning for tokens with similar names to popular tokens
userStories.notes: Created src/mcp-external/tools/token-search.ts with handleTokenSearch(). Fetches from token.jup.ag/all with 24h cache in .donut-token-cache.json. Returns top 5 scored matches. Includes Levenshtein distance check for similar names to popular tokens (SOL, USDC, BONK, etc.) with warning messages.

userStories.title: Transaction Safety Guard
userStories.description: As a trader, I want safeguards against failed/stuck transactions so that I don't lose funds.
userStories.notes: Implemented in swap.ts: simulateTransaction() before signing, 60s timeout polling loop, SwapResult.status enum for clear states, recoveryInstructions field with Solscan link for stuck/failed transactions.

userStories.title: Base Wallet Integration
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to connect my Base wallet so that I can trade on Base chain.
acceptanceCriteria: Support wallet via private key in .env (BASE_PRIVATE_KEY)
donut wallet status shows Base wallet and ETH balance
Same security constraints as Solana wallet (no logging, etc.)
userStories.notes: Created src/mcp-external/tools/base-wallet.ts using viem. Implements handleBaseWalletStatus(), getBaseTokenBalance(), getBaseAccountForSigning(). Keys loaded via loadBaseWallet() at execution time only. Supports mainnet and testnet via BASE_TESTNET flag. Added donut_base_balance and donut_wallet_status tools to MCP server. .env.example updated with BASE_PRIVATE_KEY config and security warning.

userStories.title: 0x Swap Execution
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to swap tokens on Base so that I can access Base ecosystem.
acceptanceCriteria: donut_swap tool detects chain from token address
Supports same interface as Jupiter swaps
Same transaction safety guards as Solana
userStories.notes: Created src/mcp-external/tools/base-swap.ts with handleBaseQuote() and handleBaseSwap() using 0x API v1. Implements detectChainFromToken() for base58 vs 0x address detection. Quote includes gasLimit, gasPriceGwei, estimatedCostEth. Same safety pattern: ERC20 approval check, simulateContract before signing, 60s timeout polling, status enum (signed/submitted/confirmed/failed/pending). Added donut_base_quote, donut_base_swap, donut_detect_chain tools to MCP server.

userStories.title: Hyperliquid Account Connection
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to connect my Hyperliquid account so that I can trade perps.
acceptanceCriteria: donut_hl_balance shows account balance and positions
userStories.notes: Created src/mcp-external/tools/hyperliquid.ts using hyperliquid npm package. Implements handleHLBalance() with wallet address derived from private key via viem. Uses HYPERLIQUID_PRIVATE_KEY env var (same EVM format). Added donut_hl_balance and donut_hl_markets tools to MCP server. .env.example updated with Hyperliquid config.

userStories.title: Perp Position Management
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to open/close leveraged positions so that I can trade perps via natural language.
acceptanceCriteria: donut_hl_open tool: { market, side, size, leverage, orderType }
donut_hl_close tool: close position by market
donut_hl_positions tool: list open positions with PnL
Liquidation price shown before opening position
userStories.notes: Implemented handleHLOpen(), handleHLClose(), handleHLPositions(), handleHLMarkets() in hyperliquid.ts. Uses SDK's order format (coin, is_buy, limit_px, order_type, reduce_only). Market orders use IOC with 0.5% slippage from current mid price. Validates leverage against market maximums from getMeta(). Returns liquidation price from position state after order.

userStories.title: Polymarket Integration
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to trade prediction markets so that I can bet on events.
userStories.notes: Created src/mcp-external/tools/polymarket.ts using @polymarket/clob-client SDK. Implements Gamma API for market discovery (searchMarketsGamma, getTrendingMarkets) and CLOB API for trading (handlePMBuy, handlePMSell). Added 6 tools: donut_pm_markets (search/trending), donut_pm_market (details with orderbook), donut_pm_buy (market/limit orders), donut_pm_sell (market/limit orders), donut_pm_orders (list open), donut_pm_cancel (cancel order). Uses Polygon wallet (POLYGON_PRIVATE_KEY) with API credential derivation. Supports GTC (limit) and FOK (market) order types. .env.example updated with Polygon/Polymarket configuration.

userStories.title: Social Signal Discovery
userStories.description: As a trader, I want to discover trending tokens from CT/Farcaster so that I can find opportunities.
acceptanceCriteria: donut_trending tool: tokens with high social volume
Filter by: mentions, sentiment, volume threshold
Returns token + social stats + link to source
userStories.notes: Created src/mcp-external/tools/social-signals.ts using @neynar/nodejs-sdk. Implements handleTrending() (aggregates token mentions from trending Farcaster feed), handleSearchMentions() (searches for specific token mentions with engagement metrics), handleTrendingTopics() (discovers trending topics/narratives). Added 3 tools: donut_trending (filter by limit, minMentions, timeWindow, network), donut_search_mentions (search query with algorithmic/recent sorting), donut_trending_topics. Includes sentiment analysis via keyword matching (bullish/bearish terms), token extraction via $SYMBOL regex patterns, and Warpcast URL construction for source links. .env.example updated with NEYNAR_API_KEY config.
